GeoidEval.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  * \file GeoidEval.cpp
00003  * \brief Command line utility for evaluation geoid heights
00004  *
00005  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2009, 2010, 2011) <charles@karney.com>
00006  * and licensed under the LGPL.  For more information, see
00007  * http://geographiclib.sourceforge.net/
00008  *
00009  * Compile with -I../include and link with Geoid.o DMS.o
00010  *
00011  * See the <a href="GeoidEval.1.html">man page</a> for usage
00012  * information.
00013  **********************************************************************/
00014 
00015 #include <iostream>
00016 #include <string>
00017 #include <sstream>
00018 #include <fstream>
00019 #include <GeographicLib/Geoid.hpp>
00020 #include <GeographicLib/DMS.hpp>
00021 #include <GeographicLib/GeoCoords.hpp>
00022 
00023 #include "GeoidEval.usage"
00024 
00025 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00026   try {
00027     using namespace GeographicLib;
00028     typedef Math::real real;
00029     bool cacheall = false, cachearea = false, verbose = false, cubic = true;
00030     real caches, cachew, cachen, cachee;
00031     std::string dir;
00032     std::string geoid = Geoid::DefaultGeoidName();
00033     std::string zone;
00034     Geoid::convertflag heightmult = Geoid::NONE;
00035     std::string istring, ifile, ofile;
00036 
00037     for (int m = 1; m < argc; ++m) {
00038       std::string arg(argv[m]);
00039       if (arg == "-a") {
00040         cacheall = true;
00041         cachearea = false;
00042       }
00043       else if (arg == "-c") {
00044         if (m + 4 >= argc) return usage(1, true);
00045         cacheall = false;
00046         cachearea = true;
00047         try {
00048           DMS::DecodeLatLon(std::string(argv[m + 1]), std::string(argv[m + 2]),
00049                             caches, cachew);
00050           DMS::DecodeLatLon(std::string(argv[m + 3]), std::string(argv[m + 4]),
00051                             cachen, cachee);
00052         }
00053         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00054           std::cerr << "Error decoding argument of -c: " << e.what() << "\n";
00055           return 1;
00056         }
00057         m += 4;
00058       } else if (arg == "--msltohae" || arg == "-msltohae")
00059         heightmult = Geoid::GEOIDTOELLIPSOID;
00060       else if (arg == "--haetomsl" || arg == "-haetomsl")
00061         heightmult = Geoid::ELLIPSOIDTOGEOID;
00062       else if (arg == "-z") {
00063         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00064         zone = argv[m];
00065         bool northp;
00066         int zonenum;
00067         try {
00068           UTMUPS::DecodeZone(zone, zonenum, northp);
00069           zone += ' ';
00070         }
00071         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00072           std::cerr << "Error decoding zone: " << e.what() << "\n";
00073           return 1;
00074         }
00075       } else if (arg == "-n") {
00076         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00077         geoid = argv[m];
00078       } else if (arg == "-d") {
00079         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00080         dir = argv[m];
00081       } else if (arg == "-l") {
00082         cubic = false;
00083       } else if (arg == "-v")
00084         verbose = true;
00085       else if (arg == "--input-string") {
00086         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00087         istring = argv[m];
00088       } else if (arg == "--input-file") {
00089         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00090         ifile = argv[m];
00091       } else if (arg == "--output-file") {
00092         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00093         ofile = argv[m];
00094       } else if (arg == "--version") {
00095         std::cout
00096           << argv[0]
00097           << ": $Id: c6e05c453e80eecea0228a09609de19270116273 $\n"
00098           << "GeographicLib version " << GEOGRAPHICLIB_VERSION_STRING << "\n";
00099         return 0;
00100       } else {
00101         int retval = usage(!(arg == "-h" || arg == "--help"), arg != "--help");
00102         if (arg == "-h")
00103           std::cout<< "\nDefault geoid path = \""   << Geoid::DefaultGeoidPath()
00104                    << "\"\nDefault geoid name = \"" << Geoid::DefaultGeoidName()
00105                    << "\"\n";
00106         return retval;
00107       }
00108     }
00109 
00110     if (!ifile.empty() && !istring.empty()) {
00111       std::cerr << "Cannot specify --input-string and --input-file together\n";
00112       return 1;
00113     }
00114     if (ifile == "-") ifile.clear();
00115     std::ifstream infile;
00116     std::istringstream instring;
00117     if (!ifile.empty()) {
00118       infile.open(ifile.c_str());
00119       if (!infile.is_open()) {
00120         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ifile << " for reading\n";
00121         return 1;
00122       }
00123     } else if (!istring.empty()) {
00124       std::string::size_type m = 0;
00125       while (true) {
00126         m = istring.find(';', m);
00127         if (m == std::string::npos)
00128           break;
00129         istring[m] = '\n';
00130       }
00131       instring.str(istring);
00132     }
00133     std::istream* input = !ifile.empty() ? &infile :
00134       (!istring.empty() ? &instring : &std::cin);
00135 
00136     std::ofstream outfile;
00137     if (ofile == "-") ofile.clear();
00138     if (!ofile.empty()) {
00139       outfile.open(ofile.c_str());
00140       if (!outfile.is_open()) {
00141         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ofile << " for wrting\n";
00142         return 1;
00143       }
00144     }
00145     std::ostream* output = !ofile.empty() ? &outfile : &std::cout;
00146 
00147     int retval = 0;
00148     try {
00149       const Geoid g(geoid, dir, cubic);
00150       try {
00151         if (cacheall)
00152           g.CacheAll();
00153         else if (cachearea)
00154           g.CacheArea(caches, cachew, cachen, cachee);
00155       }
00156       catch (const std::exception& e) {
00157         std::cerr << "ERROR: " << e.what() << "\nProceeding without a cache\n";
00158       }
00159       if (verbose) {
00160         std::cerr << "Geoid file: "    << g.GeoidFile()     << "\n"
00161                   << "Description: "   << g.Description()   << "\n"
00162                   << "Interpolation: " << g.Interpolation() << "\n"
00163                   << "Date & Time: "   << g.DateTime()      << "\n"
00164                   << "Offset (m): "    << g.Offset()        << "\n"
00165                   << "Scale (m): "     << g.Scale()         << "\n"
00166                   << "Max error (m): " << g.MaxError()      << "\n"
00167                   << "RMS error (m): " << g.RMSError()      << "\n";
00168         if (g.Cache())
00169           std::cerr<< "Caching:"
00170                    << "\n SW Corner: " << g.CacheSouth() << " " << g.CacheWest()
00171                    << "\n NE Corner: " << g.CacheNorth() << " " << g.CacheEast()
00172                    << "\n";
00173       }
00174 
00175       GeoCoords p;
00176       std::string s;
00177       const char* spaces = " \t\n\v\f\r,"; // Include comma as space
00178       while (std::getline(*input, s)) {
00179         try {
00180           real height = 0;
00181           if (heightmult) {
00182             std::string::size_type pb = s.find_last_not_of(spaces);
00183             std::string::size_type pa = s.find_last_of(spaces, pb);
00184             std::string::size_type px = s.find_last_not_of(spaces, pa);
00185             if (pa == std::string::npos || pb == std::string::npos ||
00186                 px == std::string::npos)
00187               throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00188             height = DMS::Decode(s.substr(pa + 1, pb - pa));
00189             s = s.substr(0, px + 1);
00190           }
00191           p.Reset(zone + s);
00192           if (heightmult) {
00193             real h = g(p.Latitude(), p.Longitude());
00194             *output << s << " "
00195                     << DMS::Encode(height + real(heightmult) * h,
00196                                    3, DMS::NUMBER) << "\n";
00197           } else {
00198             real gradn, grade;
00199             real h = g(p.Latitude(), p.Longitude(), gradn, grade);
00200             *output << DMS::Encode(h, 4, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00201                     << DMS::Encode(gradn * 1e6, 2, DMS::NUMBER)
00202                     << (Math::isnan(gradn) ? " " : "e-6 ")
00203                     << DMS::Encode(grade * 1e6, 2, DMS::NUMBER)
00204                     << (Math::isnan(grade) ? "\n" : "e-6\n");
00205           }
00206         }
00207         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00208           *output << "ERROR: " << e.what() << "\n";
00209           retval = 1;
00210         }
00211       }
00212     }
00213     catch (const std::exception& e) {
00214       std::cerr << "Error reading " << geoid << ": " << e.what() << "\n";
00215       retval = 1;
00216     }
00217     return retval;
00218   }
00219   catch (const std::exception& e) {
00220     std::cerr << "Caught exception: " << e.what() << "\n";
00221     return 1;
00222   }
00223   catch (...) {
00224     std::cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n";
00225     return 1;
00226   }
00227 }
